english.segment1: I will love you, Lord, my strength. I belong to you. And I will bless you while I live. And I will lift my hands up in your name.
english.segment2: Jesus, you alone are Holy. You alone are Holy. Name above every name. Lord Jesus, you alone are worthy. You alone are worthy. Jesus, the lamb that was slain.
english.segment3: Nailed to the cross for me. Died and rose again. You redeemed me to the father. By your blood. You cleansed me from all sin.
